1 ; Creation d un lutin
2 ; 10 mars 2024
3 ; -----------------------
10 RESTORE
20 BANK NEW b
30 FOR i=0 TO 511
40 READ n
50 BANK b POKE i,n
60 NEXT i
70 SAVE "lutin.spr" BANK b,0,512
9000 ; Lutin 1
9001 DATA 000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000
